/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC  -pthread   -std=c++0x   -g -fno-inline   -pthread  -shared -Wl,-soname,libgromacs_mpi.so.2 -o ../../lib/libgromacs_mpi.so.2.0.0 @CMakeFiles/libgromacs.dir/objects1.rsp  -Wl,-rpath,"\$ORIGIN/../lib:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib" /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -ldl -lrt -lm ../contrib/fftw/fftwBuild-prefix/lib/libfftw3f.a -lpthread -fopenmp
